translation.text: Trains are suspended between Penrith & Lithgow in both directions due to an incident at Wentworth Falls. Police have requested all trains be stopped until further notice. We have no forecast for the resumption of train services. A limited amount of replacement buses are beginning to arrive on site. Please consider making your own travel arrangements if possible as lengthy delays can be expected. If you are travelling from Central, Strathfield, Parramatta & Blacktown to the Blue Mountains, please board a suburban service to Penrith & change there for a replacement bus service to complete your journey. Please allow additional travel time, check transport apps or platform screens for service updates.
due to an operational issue at Central
Strathfield due to a train requiring mechanical repairs earlier. This train was defective and had to return to Newcastle to be replaced and running is approximately 50mins late.
due to a train requiring mechanical repairs earlier. This train was defective and had to return to Newcastle to be replaced and running is approximately 50mins late.

Bullaburra, Wentworth Falls, Leura, Katoomba, Medlow Bath, Blackheath Trains are suspended between Penrith & Lithgow in both directions due to an incident at Wentworth Falls. Police have requested all trains be stopped until further notice. We have no forecast for the resumption of train services. A limited amount of replacement buses are arriving on site. Please consider making your own travel arrangements if possible as lengthy delays can be expected. If you are travelling from Central, Strathfield, Parramatta & Blacktown to the Blue Mountains, please board a suburban service to Penrith & change there for a replacement bus service to complete your journey. Please allow additional travel time, check transport apps or platform screens for service updates.

due to an incident at Wentworth Falls. You can catch the 11:28pm Central to Penrith train and change at Penrith for a Rail replacement bus to complete your journey. Please allow additional travel time.

Until Wednesday 9 September the lift that goes from the concourse to street level will be closed for maintenance. If you require a lift or easy access you may wish to consider using Central as an alternative. If you require further assistance please see station staff or call 8337 8400.
The lift between the concourse and platform 5 is temporarily out of service.
The lift between the concourse and Railway Parade is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask staff or phone 9563 7549.
The lift between the concourse and platform 4 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9563 7273.

From 14 June to 16 August 2020 the lift between the concourse and platforms 1 and 2 is temporarily unavailable due to scheduled upgrade works. If you require a lift or easy access please change at Mount Druitt or Werrington stations to get to your destination. For further assistance, please see station staff or call 9851 7525.

There are changes to the way you access and move around Town Hall Station. Please follow directions of station staff for guidance and ensure you maintain physical distance from others throughout your journey.

There are changes to Platforms 16 and 17 at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works.    Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work has moved from the middle of the platform to the southern end of the platform. Temporary concrete ramps connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete floor surface areas.   For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.    If you are travelling to Central Station and require assistance to alight from Platforms 16 and 17, please board via the front door of the fourth train carriage.   For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works, visit sydneymetro.info.

From Wednesday 10 June to Wednesday 9 September the lift that goes from the concourse to street level will be closed for maintenance. If you require a lift or easy access you may wish to consider using Central as an alternative. If you require further assistance please see station staff or call 8337 8400.

From 14 June to 16 August 2020 the lift between the concourse and platforms 1 and 2 is temporarily unavailable due to scheduled upgrade works. If you require a lift or easy access please change at Mount Druitt or Werrington stations to get to your destination. For further assistance, please see station staff or call 9851 7525.

New Metro Platforms are being constructed on platforms 1 & 2 at Sydenham Station. T3 Bankstown Line services to the City operate from platform 3 & T3 Bankstown Line services to Lidcombe and Liverpool operate from platform 4. Platform 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works - A new Metro concourse is also being constructed at the Northern end of the station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please see staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
